column4: hi.  my wife's window's xp pc just bit it.  won't boot.  can I use the ubuntu live cd to rescue her Outlook contacts?
you can use the Ubuntu liveCD to copy the files to another networked computer or burn them to a cd-r (if you have two optical drives)
how do I access the drives?  If I cd to /dev/hdc I just get what's on the disc.
